short_description: Experience a new era of fighting! Master diverse characters, dynamic combat, and innovative features like Drive System. Unleash your inner warrior in intense battles!
Description: Gruesome bounty hunts in the Louisiana bayou. Fight horrifying creatures and rival players for valuable rewards. Survive, extract, and prosper.
Explore a post-apocalyptic open world, battling mutated creatures. Master unique resonators and build a powerful team to uncover secrets.
Description: Experience intense, tactical combat across a stunning island environment. Command, survive, and build in a dynamic sandbox war.
Description: Scavenge abandoned moons for scrap to sell, meeting quota. Survive hazardous environments and terrifying creatures with your crew, or die trying.
Description: High-stakes, tactical FPS. Loot, raid, and escape with valuable gear. Survive fierce combat and extract to keep your spoils.
Explore a post-apocalyptic world, battling Ethereals in fast-paced, stylish action combat with a dynamic team. Uncover mysteries!
Description: Survive, build, and dominate a prehistoric world. Tame dinosaurs, craft weapons, and explore vast landscapes against other players.
Build an empire, explore vast lands, research technologies, and conquer or befriend civilizations. Shape history through strategic decisions and warfare.
Description: Dive into divine battles! Assemble your team, master unique gods, and conquer the battlefield in this action-packed, objective-focused MOBA.
Explore a vast open world. Engage in large-scale battles, siege warfare, and dynamic weather systems. Shape the fate of the land.
Explore a vast, shrouded world. Craft, build, and survive. Fight through hordes of enemies and uncover secrets.
Explore a mysterious toy factory overrun by living toys. Solve puzzles, survive terrifying chases, and uncover a dark secret.
Embark on a co-op adventure! Master diverse, inventive gameplay mechanics to overcome challenges together as a fractured couple.
Crush hordes of enemies on vast battlefields! Unleash devastating Musou attacks, conquer territories, and experience epic historical warfare.
Experience next-gen hockey! Enhanced physics, dynamic AI, and immersive arenas redefine the ultimate on-ice experience. Dominate with skill and strategy.
Construct poker hands, optimize your deck with powerful synergies, and reach increasingly absurd score thresholds. A strategic roguelike with card-based combat.
Navigate vibrant 2D worlds, befriending quirky characters. Solve puzzles, gather resources, and build your dream town, all while uncovering secrets.
Explore a world on the brink of ruin, wielding evocative combat, strategic choices, and the power of dreams to shape your destiny.

game_title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle
short_description: Explore exotic locations, solve ancient puzzles, and battle Nazis in this thrilling action-adventure game! Use your whip and wits to survive.
Realistic, team-based World War II shooter. Experience intense infantry combat, tanks, and artillery. Coordinate with your squad for victory across vast maps.
Leap, bound, and swim through vibrant 3D worlds to collect Power Stars and rescue Princess Peach from Bowser's clutches! Explore vast landscapes.
Explore the Zone, a hostile wasteland. Scavenge, fight mutants, and uncover anomalies. Survive, adapt, and unravel the mysteries.
Description: A hardcore open-world shooter. Survive anomalies, fight mutants and stalkers, scavenge for loot, and forge alliances in the Zone.
Description: Cooperative shopping chaos! Team up with friends to tackle grocery lists, manage shelves, and survive the supermarket frenzy before closing time!
Explore a vast world, battle fearsome monsters, and team up with others. Customize your character and classes for thrilling adventures!
Brutal trials of psychological horror. Survive nightmarish experiments alone or with others, facing terrifying enemies and gruesome environments.
Make choices that shape android and human destinies. Navigate a near-future Detroit, investigating android deviancy and its societal impact.
Realistic MMA action! Experience intense striking, grappling, and submissions. Build your fighter, compete online, and chase UFC glory.
Cultivate your farm, befriend villagers, and unravel mysteries in a vibrant, shared-world community. Explore, craft, and build your dream life!
Survive alone in the Amazon rainforest. Craft tools, build shelter, hunt for food, and battle psychological and physical challenges to stay alive.
Explore a world transformed! Experience dynamic weather, detailed environments, and realistic aircraft physics. Master your skills and fly!
Description: Assemble a team of champions, strategically position them, and battle against seven other players for ultimate victory. Adapt and overcome!
Explore a vast, procedurally generated universe. Discover planets, trade resources, fight pirates, and build bases. Survive and thrive!
Cultivate diverse crops, raise animals, and manage your sprawling farm across new maps. Experience expanded mechanics and realistic agricultural life!
Fight to rebuild Washington D.C. in a post-pandemic America. Explore a dynamic open world, team up, and battle for survival against enemy factions.
Description: Battle iconic characters across massive stages! Unleash powerful attacks, master techniques, and knock foes off-screen to win in this epic fighting game.
Survive a zombie apocalypse in an open world. Parkour through the city, scavenge for resources, and fight infected at night.
Description: Infiltrate Nazi-occupied France as an elite sniper. Master stealth, environmental takedowns, and long-range shots to aid the Resistance.
Explore a vast, mystical island, conquer territories, craft powerful gear, and battle supernatural threats. Shape your destiny in a dynamic, player-driven world.
Explore a vibrant island, make friends, and build your dream vacation! Craft, decorate, solve puzzles, and uncover hidden secrets.
Assemble a band, conquer the charts! Build your skills, write hits, and outmaneuver rivals in a fast-paced musical competition.
Fast-paced tank combat! Destroy enemy vehicles in intense team battles. Customize your steel beast and dominate the battlefield.
A grim, roguelike dungeon crawler. Explore procedurally generated rooms, battle grotesque creatures, and collect bizarre items for devastating builds.
Survive a dynamic open world. Craft, scavenge, and fight for territory against ruthless factions and nature's fury. Extract or die trying.
Description: Explore a vast open world, steal cars, shoot enemies, and build a criminal empire. Freedom and chaos reign in this action-packed adventure.
Embark on stylish adventures! Style your avatar with dazzling outfits, compete in fashion challenges, and explore a magical world.
Description: Blast through mayhem with four Vault Hunters, each wielding unique skills. Loot countless guns, face off against ruthless enemies, and save the galaxy!
Description: Explore a vast fantasy world! Engage in epic PvP battles and challenging PvE content. Level up, gear up, and conquer!
Build, stock, and manage your own grocery store! Handle inventory, pricing, and customer satisfaction to grow your business from the ground up.
